item.title: [EN] Network Address Translation (NAT)
item.description: Hi everyone, In this article, I will walk you through Network Address Translation (NAT)â€”what it is, how it works, why we use it, and how to configure it using a lab. NAT (Network Address Translation) is a method used in routers and firewalls that allows private IP addresses within a local network to access the public internet using a single or a few public IP addresses.
